title: Aerospike Enterprise - Node View
description: Visualizes key metrics across multiple nodes in a cluster, including migrations, object counts, partitions, latencies, resource utilization, and more.

definition.content: The **Node Overview** dashboard visualizes key metrics across multiple nodes in a cluster, including migrations, object counts, partitions, latencies, resource utilization, and more.
